cause.description:
The Friends also sponsor special programs and the annual fundraiser Dinner in the Stacks. The proceeds enable the library to acquire new books, equipment, and materials for programs and activities such as the Children's Summer Reading Program.
1. fundraising
2. coordinating volunteers
3. operation of the library gift shop, Friendship Place
cause.mission: makes significant contributions to the library.
cause.name: Friends of the Prescott Valley Area Library
